quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: For me life is continuously being hungry. The meaning of life is not simply to exist, to survive, but to move ahead, to go up, to achieve, to conquer.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: The resistance that you fight physically in the gym and the resistance that you fight in life can only build a strong character.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Help others and give something back. I guarantee you will discover that while public service improves the lives and the world around you, its greatest reward is the enrichment and new meaning it will bring your own life.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: It's simple, if it jiggles, it's fat.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: The future is green energy, sustainability, renewable energy.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Milk is for babies. When you grow up you have to drink beer.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Bodybuilding is much like any other sport. To be successful, you must dedicate yourself 100% to your training, diet and mental approach.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: The mind is the limit. As long as the mind can envision the fact that you can do something, you can do it, as long as you really believe 100 percent.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: The worst thing I can be is the same as everybody else. I hate that.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow. This area of pain divides the champion from someone else who is not a champion. That's what most people lack, having the guts to go on and just say they'll go through the pain no matter what happens.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: My body is like breakfast, lunch, and dinner. I don't think about it, I just have it.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: What we face may look insurmountable. But I learned something from all those years of training and competing. I learned something from all those sets and reps when I didn't think I could lift another ounce of weight. What I learned is that we are always stronger than we know.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Failure is not an option. Everyone has to succeed.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I saw a woman wearing a sweatshirt with Guess on it. I said, Thyroid problem?
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I knew I was a winner back in the late sixties. I knew I was destined for great things. People will say that kind of thinking is totally immodest. I agree. Modesty is not a word that applies to me in any way - I hope it never will.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Training gives us an outlet for suppressed energies created by stress and thus tones the spirit just as exercise conditions the body.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: As long as I live, I will never forget that day 21 years ago when I raised my hand and took the oath of citizenship. Do you know how proud I was? I was so proud that I walked around with an American flag around my shoulders all day long.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: In our society, the women who break down barriers are those who ignore limits.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I'll be back.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I speak directly to the people, and I know that the people of California want to have better leadership. They want to have great leadership. They want to have somebody that will represent them. And it doesn't matter if you're a Democrat or a Republican, young or old.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I didn't leave bodybuilding until I felt that I had gone as far as I could go. It will be the same with my film career. When I feel the time is right, I will then consider public service. I feel that the highest honor comes from serving people and your country.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Learned helplessness is the giving-up reaction, the quitting response that follows from the belief that whatever you do doesn't matter.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Money doesn't make you happy. I now have $50 million but I was just as happy when I had $48 million.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: The success I have achieved in bodybuilding, motion pictures, and business would not have been possible without the generosity of the American people and the freedom here to pursue your dreams.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I have a love interest in every one of my films: a gun.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I'm not perfect.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Government's first duty and highest obligation is public safety.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Start wide, expand further, and never look back.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: If it bleeds, we can kill it.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: You can scream at me, call me for a shoot at midnight, keep me waiting for hours - as long as what ends up on the screen is perfect.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: If you work hard and play by the rules, this country is truly open to you. You can achieve anything.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: If it's hard to remember, it'll be difficult to forget.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: My relationship to power and authority is that I'm all for it. People need somebody to watch over them. Ninety-five percent of the people in the world need to be told what to do and how to behave.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I am a big believer in education, because when I grew up in Austria - when I grew up in Austria I had a great education. I had great teachers.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: As you know, I'm an immigrant. I came over here as an immigrant, and what gave me the opportunities, what made me to be here today, is the open arms of Americans. I have been received. I have been adopted by America.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I welcome and seek your ideas, but do not bring me small ideas; bring me big ideas to match our future.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: The writing is important, but the way you say the line and the pause you give it, the facial expression - all of that is very important.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I have a private plane. But I fly commercial when I go to environmental conferences.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: One of my movies was called 'True Lies.' It's what the Democrats should have called their convention.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I'm addicted to exercising and I have to do something every day.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I do the same exercises I did 50 years ago and they still work. I eat the same food I ate 50 years ago and it still works.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: 'I'll be back' always sounded a little girly to me.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: And now, of course this is another thing I didn't count on, that now as the governor of the state of California, I am selling California worldwide. You see that? Selling.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: You know, nothing is more important than education, because nowhere are our stakes higher; our future depends on the quality of education of our children today.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: My own dreams fortunately came true in this great state. I became Mr. Universe; I became a successful businessman. And even though some people say I still speak with a slight accent, I have reached the top of the acting profession.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: As president, Reagan worked very well with Democrats to do big things. It is true that he worked to reduce the size of government and cut federal taxes and he eliminated many regulations, but he also raised taxes when necessary.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: There is no place, no country, more compassionate more generous more accepting and more welcoming than the United States of America.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Well, you know, I'm the forever optimist.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: To restore the trust of the people, we must reform the way the government operates.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I am the most helpful and open up doors for everyone and I like to share.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I just use my muscles as a conversation piece, like someone walking a cheetah down 42nd Street.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Freedom is a right ultimately defended by the sacrifice of America's servicemen and women.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I'm not looking for sympathy at all.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: No matter the nationality, no matter the religion, no matter the ethnic background, America brings out the best in people.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: If my life was a movie, no one would believe it.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Gray Davis can run a dirty campaign better than anyone, but he can't run a state.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Everything I have, my career, my success, my family, I owe to America.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I came to Hollywood and within a decade I was one of the biggest action stars of all time.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I don't suffer of anything that I've lost.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I was striving to be the most muscular man, and it got me into the movies. It got me everything that I have.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Maria is the best reason to come home.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Women are the engine driving the growth in California's economy. Women make California's economy unique.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: For 20 years, Simon & Schuster asked me, 'Why don't you write your autobiography?'
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I have inhaled, exhaled everything.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I think that people are interested seeing me on the screen.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: People should make up their own mind about what they think of me.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Teddy Roosevelt is still a hero among environmentalists for his conservationist policies.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I made my fair share of mistakes.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I think Americans are very patriotic.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: What's fascinating is, people in Washington would rather spend time in Hollywood, and people in Hollywood would rather spend time in Washington.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Even with my divorce and with everything, I don't need money.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I feel good because I believe I have made progress in rebuilding the people's trust in their government.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: We are a forward-looking people, and we must have a forward-looking government.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I have plenty of money, unlike other Hollywood celebrities or athletes that have not invested well.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I know a lot of athletes and models are written off as just bodies. I never felt used for my body.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I went from being the Terminator to being the governator.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I would never exchange my life with anybody else's.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I told Warren if he mentions Prop. 13 one more time, he has to do 500 push-ups.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Politically there were failures. And also on the personal level, there were tremendous failures.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Well, I think that California has had a history of always spending more money than it takes in.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I believe with all my heart that America remains 'the great idea' that inspires the world. It is a privilege to be born here. It is an honor to become a citizen here. It is a gift to raise your family here, to vote here, and to live here.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I was born in Europe... and I've traveled all over the world. I can tell you that there is no place, no country, that is more compassionate, more generous, more accepting, and more welcoming than the United States of America.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: When the people become involved in their government, government becomes more accountable, and our society is stronger, more compassionate, and better prepared for the challenges of the future.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: It's time to stop thinking of the Republican Party as an exclusive club where your ideological card is checked at the door, and start thinking about how we can attract more solution-based leaders like Nathan Fletcher and Anthony Adams.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: When you campaign and have to participate in so many debates just to the win the nomination of your party, you've had a lot of practice. You get to figure out as you go from one debate to another where you made your mistakes. By the time you get to the big debate you're pretty polished.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: People need to be insured so when you have an accident out there, or when something catastrophic happens to you, that you're covered and there's not someone else has to pay for you. That is as simple as that.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: In this country, it doesn't make any difference where you were born. It doesn't make any difference who your parents were. It doesn't make any difference if, like me, you couldn't even speak English until you were in your twenties.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: My friend James Cameron and I made three films together - True Lies, The Terminator and Terminator 2. Of course, that was during his early, low-budget, art-house period.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: The biggest problem that we have is that California is being run now by special interests. All of the politicians are not anymore making the moves for the people, but for special interests and we have to stop that.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I had this child, and it destroyed my family.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I'm sure a lot of people out there make mistakes.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Political courage is not political suicide.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I can promise you that when I go to Sacramento, I will pump up Sacramento.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
